subject: Re: Frank S. -  Question...
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I don't do anything but scan the whole band, sometimes the weak 
stations can be heard. Supposedly the Mini box is better made, with 
coils that match the radio, but I've only seen one once. 

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Frank, do you put a circuit in to cut out the weak stations/noise 
> between the stronger stations (stronger signals) that the random or 
> linear scan can lock on?  Block filter?? Do you know if the MiniBox 
> does this?
> 
> Thanks, LC  ;)
>
